column2: Duke Energy fined over $100 mln for environmental violationsDuke Energy fined over $100 mln for environmental violations Duke Energy Corp has agreed to pay a fine of about $102 million for environmental violations related to a power plant's coal ash spill into a North Carolina river last year and the company's management of coal ash basins in the state. Lockheed Martin to pay $62 mln to settle 401(k) lawsuit Lockheed Martin Corp agreed to pay $62 million to settle a lawsuit in which employees accused the defense contractor of mismanaging their 401(k) retirement plan
